job_history.work_description: Taught Language Arts daily to sixth grade students. Performed interventions for Benchmark and SAT10 standardized tests to help children become proficient in Language Arts. Assessed students reading and comprehensive skills through group discussion, testing, and oral and writing responses.

Tutored Sixth & Seventh grade students that tested basic or below basic in Language Arts. Worked with students from varied ethnic, racial, and religious backgrounds. Maintained accountability of students safety and whereabouts during hours of operations.

Taught Mathematics, Language, Spelling, Reading, Social Studies, Arkansas History, Health, and Science. Tutored fifth grade students that tested basic or below basic in Math and Language Arts. Worked with students from varied ethnic, racial, and religious backgrounds.

job_history.role_name: Teacher of four year old children
job_history.work_description: Introduced children to mathematics, language, science, and social studies. Used games, music, artwork, films, books, computers, and other tools to teach basic skills.

education.university: University of Arkansas at Pine Bluff
University of Arkansas at Pine Bluff

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Over 30 years of experience in teaching various subjects to students of different age groups and backgrounds, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.explanation: Assessed students' reading and comprehensive skills through various methods, including group discussions, testing, and oral and writing responses, showing strong proficiency.
